TEXT: The Cult's triumph and immortal dark warlock of the Beyond. NL Possesses power over the Void and all other elements.
NL You Conjure your greatest spells...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~ascended~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
